question_stem: Q3. Variable “Married” is NOT very significant in model M2. True or False?
question_stem_html: Q3. Variable “Married” is NOT very significant in model M2. True or False?

choices.explanation: Ans: True. Its p-value is 0.33, quite large. It indicates the weak contribution of this variable in the model.

items.solution: Ans: True. Its p-value is 0.33, quite large. It indicates the weak contribution of this variable in the model.
